ruleChapterList:
<js>(function(result){
	var list = [];
	eval('('+new String(result).replace(/,\]/g,"]")+')').data.list.forEach(function(chapters){
		Array.prototype.push.apply(list, chapters.list);
	});	
return JSON.stringify(list);
})(result)</js>@json:$
